author: senh
title: From Chicago to Mackinac Island, a Tour of Lake Michigan
text: BING NEWS: From Chicago to Mackinac Island, a Tour of Lake Michigan We left to the south and returned from the north. In doing so, we fulfilled the grandest dream of Magellan, the dream of circumnavigation. Our compass was GPS and our logic was simple.
